paramInformation.label: Working mode
paramInformation.description: Module presentation on the user interface.

paramInformation.label: Activate / deactivate functions ALL ON / ALL OFF
paramInformation.description: DIN dimmer module responds to commands ALL ON / ALL OFF

options.label: ALL ON is not active, ALL OFF is not active
ALL ON is not active, ALL OFF active
ALL ON active, ALL OFF is not active
ALL ON active, ALL OFF active

paramInformation.label: Automatic turning off output after set time
Automatic turning on output after set time
Enable / Disable Double click function
paramInformation.description: If Double click function is enabled, double click to maximum dimming power

paramInformation.label: Power reporting in watts on power change
paramInformation.description: Reporting the power in Watts on power change larger then the setpoint

paramInformation.label: Power reporting in Watts by time interval
Dimming time (soft on/off)
paramInformation.description: Set value means time of moving the Dimmer between min. and max. dimming

paramInformation.label: Dimming time when key pressed
paramInformation.description: Time to moving the Dimmer between min. and max values (in seconds).

paramInformation.label: Ignore start level
paramInformation.description: Ignore or respect start level when used together with association group 3

paramInformation.label: Dimming duration
paramInformation.description: This parameter is used with association group 3.

paramInformation.label: Digital temperature sensor reporting
paramInformation.description: Reporting temperature when change is larger than defined by this parameter
